#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<cstdio>

#define i(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define l(x) scanf("%ld",&x)
#define ll(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define ull(x) scanf("%llu",&x)
#define ui(x) scanf("%u",&x)
#define ul(x) scanf("%lu",&x)
#define rep(n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define pi(n) printf("%d\n",&n)

int main(){
	int t;
	i(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		i(n);
		int a[n];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];

		}
		int min=n-1;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			int count=1;
			int key=a[i]+1;
			for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++)
			{
				if(a[j]==key)
				{
				    count++;
				}
				key++;

			}
			if(n-count<min) min=n-count;
		}
		cout<<min<<endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
